name: CaregiverRole
title: Caregiver Role
description: Description of caregiving role(s) the persons plays to family members/friends (e.g., young children, disabled children, parents, spouse, etc) (Business ID: Entry 115499)

contains.display: Caregiver for person with age-related complaints, chronic diseases or frailty
